title: Prayer in hand-written calligraphy from P.O.W archive

techniques_name:writing (process)
object_colour:multicolored
physical_appearance:This is a handwritten calligraphy consisting of a prayer written on a piece of black sheet of paper. The title is printed at the top in reddish ink. The first and last line of the prayer is written in black ink. The rest of the prayer is written in reddish ink. There is a blue border around the prayer. The sheet of paper has several tears and holes in it
 especially along the left
 and top sides.

context_8:armed forces
sgcool_label_text:This artefact is part of the archive of James Steele
 Royal Artillery (Field) who served in Malaya from January 1941-February 1942
 when interned as a P.O.W at Changi until his release in October 1945.
